about_the_game:
Story

Lyra awakens to a bewildering discovery: her father’s legendary sword lies on her table. Confused and worried, she rushes to ask her father what it means, only to discover that he’s been cursed by the god, Hypnos. With her father too weak to fight, Lyra must find and defeat Hypnos before it is too late.

Features

  • Choice-Driven Storytelling: The choices you make shape key moments in Lyra's journey. Even small actions can ripple into larger consequences. How will your decisions unfold?

    - ! THIS WILL NOT BE THE SAME IN ALPHA 1.2, PLEASE READ ABOVE ! -

  • Full Combat System: A combat system including a light and heavy attack. The inclusion of stamina also adds a whole new layer to the combat, light attacks deal less damage but conserve stamina, while heavy attacks deal more damage but drain a lot of stamina.

  • Skill Levels: Whiskara features a skill level system. Right now it allows the player to increase their skill in speech, allowing dialogue with some characters to unlock alternate ways to do quests.

before you buy

I strongly recommend reading 'Whiskara Alpha 1.2 - What Will Happen In This Big Update' before buying Whiskara, in Alpha 1.2 there will be a lot of big changes that change how the game is played, so I'd highly recommend reading that announcement, usually listed above this section.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-540 | AMD Phenom II X2 545
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 440 | Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p Native, 60fps @ Very Low - Support for DirectX 11 (Feature Level 11.0, Shader Model 5.0) is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 Ti | Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
